text: <a href="../1-John-3-1/" title="1 John 3:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.

<a href="../1-John-3-2/" title="1 John 3:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.
<a href="../1-John-3-3/" title="1 John 3:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.
<a href="../1-John-3-4/" title="1 John 3:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law: for sin is the transgression of the law.
<a href="../1-John-3-5/" title="1 John 3:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins; and in him is no sin.
<a href="../1-John-3-6/" title="1 John 3:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not: whosoever sinneth hath not seen him, neither known him.

<a href="../1-John-3-7/" title="1 John 3:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 Little children, let no man deceive you: he that doeth righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.

<a href="../1-John-3-8/" title="1 John 3:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 He that committeth sin is of the devil; for the devil sinneth from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.

<a href="../1-John-3-9/" title="1 John 3:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin; for his seed remaineth in him: and he cannot sin, because he is born of God.

<a href="../1-John-3-10/" title="1 John 3:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 In this the children of God are manifest, and the children of the devil: whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God, neither he that loveth not his brother.
<a href="../1-John-3-11/" title="1 John 3:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.

<a href="../1-John-3-12/" title="1 John 3:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 Not as Cain, *who* was of that wicked one, and slew his brother. And wherefore slew he him? Because his own works were evil, and his brother's righteous.
<a href="../1-John-3-13/" title="1 John 3:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 Marvel not, my brethren, if the world hate you.

<a href="../1-John-3-14/" title="1 John 3:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 We know that we have passed from death unto life, because we love the brethren. He that loveth not *his* brother abideth in death.

<a href="../1-John-3-15/" title="1 John 3:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer: and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him.

<a href="../1-John-3-16/" title="1 John 3:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 Hereby perceive we the love *of God*, because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay down *our* lives for the brethren.

<a href="../1-John-3-17/" title="1 John 3:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 But whoso hath this world's good, and seeth his brother have need, and shutteth up his bowels *of compassion* from him, how dwelleth the love of God in him?
<a href="../1-John-3-18/" title="1 John 3:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.
<a href="../1-John-3-19/" title="1 John 3:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19 And hereby we know that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before him.
<a href="../1-John-3-20/" title="1 John 3:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20 For if our heart condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knoweth all things.
<a href="../1-John-3-21/" title="1 John 3:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21 Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, *then* have we confidence toward God.

<a href="../1-John-3-22/" title="1 John 3:22 KJV verse detail"><span id="24" class="versehover">22 And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.

<a href="../1-John-3-23/" title="1 John 3:23 KJV verse detail"><span id="25" class="versehover">23 And this is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another, as he gave us commandment.

<a href="../1-John-3-24/" title="1 John 3:24 KJV verse detail"><span id="26" class="versehover">24 And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him, and he in him. And hereby we know that he abideth in us, by the Spirit which he hath given us.
